Recording Plan
1. Introduction: Syllabus; Course Website; Blackboard LMS; CL Requirements; Weekly Zoom Meeting
2. Introduction: Engineering hydrology (JB Section 1. -1.1)
3. Introduction: Hydrologic Cycle and Water Budgets (JB Section 1.1-end of chapter)
4. Precipitation: JB Section 2.-through 2.2
5. Precipitation: JB Section 2.3 - end of chapter
5.X Precipitation Extensions
6. Infiltration: Models of infiltration
7. Infiltration: Evapotranspiration and Soil Moisture
8. Infiltration: Other abstractions
9. Runoffgeneration: processes hortonian excess, dunne excess
10. Runoff generation: watershed delineation
